mapper.select: select id, user_id, password, nickname, is_admin, is_withdraw, created_at, updated_at from user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, password, nickname, is_withdraw, is_admin, created_at, updated_at) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{isWithdraw}, #{isAdmin}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
